channel.title: A speech about flaming
channel.description:
Just to say, This post may seem useless to some people but its true everything i will tell you is true. You may not want to believe it. So before i start i want to tell you that this is for the people who don’t flame the people who do flame will flame this post this is just a big post (discussion) about flaming so i encourage you to flame and call them examples.
Some people like new people, people Bad at scripting, and even you do something stupid in your life time, you also ask stupid questions. But think about this, when you ask a question that you want to learn more about, don’t be afraid to ask someone. Everybody has some type of question that they know is stupid and they will get insulted for, but the flamers out there. Think about this.. you where that one person at a time or another too and you asked stupid questions that people insulted you for and maybe even put your post in their signatures but hey not all of us are perfect. The main reason you guys are flaming people are because you think they are annoying, stupid, or even lazy because they are asking questions they are confused about. The most common reasons people flame are because the might recolor models, or maybe they ask stupid questions like "i don’t have a client.java where do i download one?". These are stupid things to get mad about because everyone starts from somewhere you or anybody in the world were born with the knowledge of a college graduate of a programming school or maybe even have a DR. Degree in technology or programming.So why do you guys flame people they are just beginning to learn how to model, program, and maybe even draw so the next time you flame make sure they are actually bad at what they have posted. I know none of the famous people like SilentCJ(modeling), Lin(C language) or anyone that you guys know didn't just come to mopar and start modeling, or scripting like Pros, They had to of started somewhere. Everyone starts from Skill level one and advances to Skill level 2, 3, And maybe even 4. Next time you flame, Do it for a reason not because you had a bad day and wanted to take your anger out on someone. Thanks for reading this post hope you guys actually take this in and use the information.

item.title: A speech about flaming
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

It’s a forum it happens…

on a side note:

just beginning to learn how to model, program,

Working with rs private servers does not mean you are learning either of these. Infact you learn none of the fundamentals when doing so.

Read full topic

item.title: A speech about flaming
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

How ironic a topic dedicated to anti flaming is now the latest arson site.

Personally I think if you can’t take it go play with your dummy.

  1. This is the internet most people either go on here for porn or for a laugh.
  2. People often get kicks out of making other people so made they dribble and turn red.
  3. Some people have really weird fettishes and like to watch a mix of people getting really angry and fucking other people. Most commonly bart or lisa simpson. (Personal experience: Downloaded Simpson movie. Reality: 3 hours Homer on Marge, Marge on Bart, Bart on Lisa, Lisa on Maggie, Maggie on Grandpa)

Read full topic

item.title: A speech about flaming
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:308643"][quote author=Frell link=topic=405035.msg2995625#msg2995625 date=1255564405]
There is no war… You guys calling it that makes you look like retards to the mitb side.
[/quote]It’s just one idiot, stop taking cheap shots at moparscape.

[center] Oh my god, I’m a Frell.[/quote]
You’re right!!! Why would i eevvveerr judge an entire forum by one member?! Oh the irony :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: A speech about flaming
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:15, topic:308604”]There is no war… You guys calling it that makes you look like retards to the mitb side.[/quote]Denying the fact that we hate each other is, for lack of better words, retarded. I can understand ignoring it, but there’s no denying it.

Read full topic

item.title: A speech about flaming
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:10, topic:308604"][quote author=Frell link=topic=405035.msg2995481#msg2995481 date=1255558679]
You’ll get warned for flaming, so don’t do it. Only complete idiots flame.

[center] SO U WANNA FUCKING TRASH TALK??? THEN U SHUD STFU HERES DOT KTHX

[/quote]

Good to know a lot of people from mitb are idiots as well.[/quote]
They are not idiots, they just cant be bothered with people who come over there and don’t want do learn anything themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: A speech about flaming
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:6, topic:308604”]I see my name is mentioned, spell it right.

I understand, but yeah, I did have to start from somewhere, but the difference betweem me and a lot of the other guys is that I’m completely self taught, when I began modelling, there were no tutorials, but some people ask for help on ridiculous questions, when all they have to do is take a little time and effort to experiment with the program and see what each tool does.[/quote]Trial and error is exactly how I learned everything. Questions that I asked here were never answered, except for one about Strings. (answered by mdog a long time ago) I remember because it’s the only real thing I learned from a member of moparscape in a help section.

[quote=“lukenuke75, post:1, topic:308611”]ok yes i did spell check this and i did with word that program didnt spell check right i guess.[/quote]Spellchecker doesn’t check grammar either… And SilentCJ is talking about your title.

Read full topic

item.title: A speech about flaming
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I see my name is mentioned, spell it right.

I understand, but yeah, I did have to start from somewhere, but the difference between me and a lot of the other guys is that I’m completely self taught, when I began modelling, there were no tutorials, but some people ask for help on ridiculous questions, when all they have to do is take a little time and effort to experiment with the program and see what each tool does.
Same with server work (not many people know about the side of me that does actually do some coding ), I think the only help I’ve ever used is from my first 10 or so posts, the rest was literally all from searching through code, and just experimenting with it, using trial and error to see what each bit does.

It just annoys me when people cannot be bothered, I’m nothing special, I’m just a regular guy, I knew nothing before I came here, except some very basic html knowledge, I had no programming experience whatsoever.
I rarely ever flame anyone, but laziness may just get me going. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: A speech about flaming
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Lin is not famous, he is just a person that can’t deal with idiots. On to topic of discussion i believe that if people can’t search for themselves or at least put in an effort for themselves, they will not make it very far, we can’t spoon feed everyone.

Not everyone with awards are famous :o

Read full topic

item.title: A speech about flaming
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:2, topic:308604”]If people get caught flaming, they get punished. Simple.[/quote]9/10 times they don’t because it’s so common. Flaming is natural in a forum, and unless it really gets out of hand, nothing comes of it.

The only people that are actually going to follow this are people that have been following it from the beginning. Someone who would normally ‘flames’ is bound to flame posts exactly like this. So why post it? Sorry to crash down on your thunder, but it’s the truth. A rant on flamers is only going to feed their flame.

Read full topic

If you’re gonna do this, atleast spell speech correctly.

Read full topic
